description.en-US: Configure your browser with a unit and currency converter and custom web search by installing the Turbo Converter & Custom Web Search extension. Instant unit & currency conversion: Accurately convert units of measurement such as temperature, length, weight, time and more. Check foreign exchange rates in seconds with our currency converter, which supports 150 global currencies and is updated on a daily basis. Custom web search: Search from the browser search bar and get results including news, weather, images, videos and more with Yahoo® as the default search provider. How to convert metric units & currencies: - Click the Turbo Converter & Custom Web Search favicon on the browser toolbar - To use the unit converter, select units to convert ‘from’ and ‘to’ (e.g. liters to gallons), and enter a value (e.g. 5 L) - To use the currency converter, select currencies to convert ‘from’ and ‘to’ (e.g. USD to GBP), and enter an amount (e.g. 100) - Get accurate conversion results We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product. Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this extension. Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management, Inc. Turbo Converter & Custom Web Search is a product offered by Innover Group. We provide users with ease of access to information and widgets from their browser. Our Privacy Policy is important for us to continue providing the users with the best possible all-round experience. Here’s a summary of user data that our add-on collects and how we use this information: 1. IP address: We collect your IP address when you use the flight information related tool offered by our extension. We anonymise your IP address and do not trace it back to you. We only use this information for analytics and reporting purposes . You can opt-out of sharing the above information with us, however, you will only be able to access limited features. 2 Technical data: Technical information (such as domain name and user agent )is also collected by the add-on to plan product upgrades and help with fraud detection.. This data is not personally identifiable and is used for optimization purposes and cannot be used to identify users. 3. Information you explicitly share with us: We collect and process flight-related information that you provide while using the tools available on our extension to return relevant results. We may also collect information that you may choose to provide us (such as your name, telephone number and/or email address) if submitted by you as part of a feedback form, crash report, enhancement suggestion or other communication from you to us. This information is only used to respond to user queries or concerns and will not be shared with any third party. Privacy Policy: https://turboconverter.co/metric/terms/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms of Service: https://turboconverter.co/metric/terms/termsofservice_ff.html

summary.en-US: Add the Turbo Converter & Custom Web Search extension to get a metric unit and currency converter by clicking the favicon on the toolbar & enjoy Yahoo® search from your browser
